name: xray-decky
description: Decky Loader plugin for VLESS proxy connections with Reality protocol support

scripts.deploy:simple: pnpm run build && rsync -avz --delete --progress --timeout=30 --partial -e 'ssh -o ServerAliveInterval=10 -o ServerAliveCountMax=3' dist/ package.json plugin.json main.py LICENSE.md backend/src/ steamdeck:/home/deck/homebrew/plugins/xray-decky/
scripts.package:local: pnpm run build && mkdir -p dist-package/xray-decky && cp -r dist package.json plugin.json main.py LICENSE.md dist-package/xray-decky/ && cp -r backend/src dist-package/xray-decky/backend/ && cd dist-package && zip -r ../xray-decky-v0.1.0.zip xray-decky && cd .. && rm -rf dist-package && echo 'âœ… ZIP created: xray-decky-v0.1.0.zip'
